response.overview: When vengeful General Francis X. Hummel seizes control of Alcatraz Island and threatens to launch missiles loaded with deadly chemical weapons into San Francisco, only a young FBI chemical weapons expert and notorious Federal prisoner have the skills to penetrate the impregnable island fortress and take him down.
response.tagline: Alcatraz. Only one man has ever broken out. Now five million lives depend on two men breaking in.
response.title: The Rock

cast.name: Ed Harris
cast.character: Brigadier General Francis X. Hummel, USMC

release_dates.note: VHS; The release date in January is not known.
